      • getChannelVideos

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage<java.util.List<Video>> getChannelVideos​(java.lang.String channelId)
                                                                             throws java.io.IOException
        Retrieves a list of videos from a specific YouTube channel. This method queries the YouTube Data API for recent videos in a given channel, limited to 10 results ordered by the date they were uploaded.
        Parameters:
        channelId - The ID of the YouTube channel for which videos are retrieved.
        Returns:
        A CompletionStage containing a list of Video objects representing the retrieved videos.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an error occurs while communicating with the YouTube API.

      • getChannelById

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage<YoutubeChannel> getChannelById​(java.lang.String channelId)
        Retrieves details of a YouTube channel by its ID. This method fetches the channel information from the YouTube Data API, including the channel's title, description, and thumbnail URL.
        Parameters:
        channelId - The ID of the YouTube channel to retrieve.
        Returns:
        A CompletionStage containing a YoutubeChannel object with the channel details, or null if the channel is not found.
